frontmatter.title: Advanced, general-purpose language features
frontmatter.description: Let's now look at the other features of the Ballerina language. These are a mixed bag of additional options to the language, making everything fit together to build a Ballerina application.
frontmatter.intro: Let's now look at the other features of the Ballerina language. These are a mixed bag of additional options to the language, making everything fit together to build a Ballerina application.

"],[612891773,"
type Date record {
    int year;
    int month;
    int day;
};

type TimeOfDay record {
    int hour;
    int minute;
    decimal seconds;
};

type Time record {
    *Date;
    *TimeOfDay;
};
"],[-1532657659,"
type Options record {|
    boolean verbose = false;
    string? outputFile = ();
|};

function foo(string inputFile, *Options options){ 
}   

public function main(){
    foo("file.txt", verbose = true);
}
"],[101229992,"
type X record {
    string str = "";
};

X x = {};
"],[-1972255241,"
type Hashable object {
    function hash() returns int;
};

function h() returns Hashable {
    var obj = object {
        function hash() returns int {
            return 42;
        }
    };
    return obj;
}
"],[-602625078,"
type Cloneable object {
    function clone() returns Cloneable;
};

type Shape object {
    *Cloneable;
    
    function draw();
};

class Circle {
    *Shape;

    function clone() returns Circle {
        return new;
    }

    function draw() {
    }
}
"],[-816061512,"
type Person distinct object {
    public string name;
};

distinct class Employee {
    *Person;
    
    function init(string name) {
        self.name = name;
    }
}

distinct class Manager {
    *Person;
    
    function init(string name) {
        self.name = name;
    }
}
"],[-268754237,"
type TimeZone readonly & object {
    function getOffset(decimal utc) returns decimal;
};
"],[-577068202,"
readonly class FixedTimeZone {
    *TimeZone;

    final decimal offset;

    function init(decimal offset) {
        self.offset = offset;
    }

    function getOffset(decimal utc) returns decimal {
        return self.offset;
    }
}
"],[1203494631,"
error err = error("Whoops", httpCode = 27);

type HttpDetail record {
    int httpCode;
};

error<HttpDetail> httpError = error("Whoops", httpCode = 27);

HttpDetail d = httpError.detail();
"],[304514355,"
function foo(string s) returns error|int {
    var res = int:fromString(s);
    if res is error {
        return error("not an integer", res);
    } else {
        return res;
    }
}
"],[2061331913,"
type IoError distinct error;

type FileErrorDetail record {
    string filename;
};

type FileIoError IoError & error<FileErrorDetail>;
"],[1077946689,"
type Foo object {
    function foo();
};

type Bar object {
    function bar();
};

type FooBar Foo & Bar;

// Same as
type FooBar object {
    *Foo;
    *Bar;
};
"],[1327923663,"
function inc(int x) returns int => x + 1;

// Same as
function inc(int x) returns int {
    return x + 1;
}
"],[141513233,"
var obj = object {
    private int x = 1;

    function getX() returns int => self.x;
};
"],[-1950630957,"
// Let expressions.
function hypot(float x) returns float =>
    let float x2 = x * x in
        float:sqrt(x2 + x2);
"],[192041222,"
const X = "x";
const Y = "y";

map<int> m = {
    [X]: 1,
    [Y]: 2
};
"],[1247553545,"
// Fixed length array
type FloatPair float[2];

FloatPair p = [1.0, 2.0];
"],[1909077751,"
// Tuple
type FloatPair [float, float];
"],[-218085626,"
// Can mix types
type Id [string, int, int];
"],[176047283,"
byte[*] a = [104, 101, 108, 108, 111];
"],[-203213432,"
type Time [int, decimal];

function toSeconds(Time ip)
    returns decimal {
        var [day, seconds] = ip;
        decimal s = 86400d*<decimal>day;
        s += seconds;
        return s;
}
"],[1808729145,"
int x = 0;
int y = 1;

type IntPair [int, int];

function assign(IntPair ip) {
    [x, y] = ip;
}

function swapXY() {
    [x, y] = [y, x];
}
"],[1888181586,"
// int followed by
// zero or more strings
type Id [int, string...];
"],[-103239018,"
function foo(int n, string... s) {
}

function bar() {
    // Param `s` will be ["x", "y", "z"].
    foo(1, "x", "y", "z");
}
"],[890068520,"
service on hl {
    // With URL file/x/y/z
    // `path` will be ["x", "y", "z"].
    resource function get file/[string... path]()
            returns string|error {
        // ...
    }
}
"],[809026702,"
type Date record {|
    int year;
    int month;
    int day;
|};

type TimeOfDay record {|
    int hour;
    int minute;
    int second;
|};

type DateTime record {|
    *Date;
    *TimeOfDay;
|};

function merge(Date d, TimeOfDay t) returns DateTime {
    return {...d, ...t};
}
"],[498929134,"
import ballerina/io;

type Id [int, string...];

function process(Id id) {
    var [n, ...path] = id;
    foreach string s in path {
        io:println(s);
    }
}
"],[1970507837,"
import ballerina/io;

type Pair record {
    int x;
    int y;
};

function foo(Pair pair) {
    match pair {
        var {x, y, ...rest} => {
            io:println(x, ", ", y, ", ", rest);
        }
    }
}
"],[1463018589,"
function whoops() returns never {
    panic error("whoops");
}
"],[478372036,"
type Pair record {
    int x;
    int y;
};

Pair p = {
    x: 1,
    y: 2,
    "color": "blue"
};

var {x: _, y: _, ...rest} = p;

// Type of `rest` is
type PairRest record {
    never x?;
    never y?;
};
"],[-1385814138,"
public function open(string path)
        returns handle|error = external;
"],[-845674122,"
function srand(int:Unsigned32 seed) = external;

function demo(int n) {
    // OK: 72 is an int:Unsigned32
    srand(72);
    // use lo bits
    srand(n & 0xFFFFFFFF);
    // panic if out of range
    srand(<int:Unsigned32>n);
}
"],[4453521,"
string:Char ch = "x";
int cp = ch.toCodePointInt();
"],[1250681135,"
type R record {
    int x;
    int y;
};

typedesc<record {}> t = R;

// Will return true.
function demo() returns boolean {
    R r = {x: 1, y: 2};
    any v = r;
    return typeof v === t;
}
"],[-1206877179,"
function demo(anydata v)
             returns float|error {
    return v.ensureType(float);
}
"],[-749147087,"
// Declaration in lang.value
public isolated function ensureType(
    any|error v,
    typedesc<any> t = <>
    ) returns t|error
= external;
"],[790799267,"
function demo(json j) returns error? {
    float f = check j.ensureType();
}
"],[916192637,"
// Module m
public type IntConstraints record {
    int minInclusive?;
    int maxInclusive?;
};

public annotation IntConstraints ConstrainedInt on type;
"],[2035315613,"
// In another module
@m:ConstrainedInt { minInclusive: 1 }
type PositiveInt int;

m:IntConstraints? c = PositiveInt.@m:ConstrainedInt;
"],[-676331442,"
function safeAdd(int n1, int n2)
                     returns int|error {
    // On overflow, get an error
    // rather than a panic  
   return trap (n1 + n2);
}
"]]
